mapper.insert: insert into cm_custom_dic (id, code, parent_id, name, scope, queue, data_type, DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_USER, CREATE_USER_DEPT, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER_ORG, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_DATE, EXT_STR1, EXT_STR2, EXT_STR3, EXT_STR4, EXT_STR5, EXT_DATE1, EXT_DATE2, EXT_NUM1, EXT_NUM2, EXT_NUM3) values (#{id}, #{code}, #{parentId}, #{name}, #{scope}, #{queue}, #{dataType}, #{deleteFlag}, #{createUser}, #{createUserDept}, #{createDate}, #{createUserOrg}, #{modifyUser}, #{modifyDate}, #{extStr1}, #{extStr2}, #{extStr3}, #{extStr4}, #{extStr5}, #{extDate1}, #{extDate2}, #{extNum1}, #{extNum2}, #{extNum3})

insert into cm_custom_dic (id, code, parent_id, name, scope, queue, data_type, DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_USER, CREATE_USER_DEPT, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER_ORG, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_DATE, EXT_STR1, EXT_STR2, EXT_STR3, EXT_STR4, EXT_STR5, EXT_DATE1, EXT_DATE2, EXT_NUM1, EXT_NUM2, EXT_NUM3) VALUES

mapper.update: update cm_custom_dic set id = #{id}, data_type = #{dataType}, code = #{code}, parent_id = #{parentId}, name = #{name}, scope = #{scope}, queue = #{queue}, DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser}, CREATE_USER_DEPT = #{createUserDept}, CREATE_USER_ORG = #{createUserOrg}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate}, MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser}, EXT_STR1 = #{extStr1}, EXT_STR2 = #{extStr2}, EXT_STR3 = #{extStr3}, EXT_STR4 = #{extStr4}, EXT_STR5 = #{extStr5}, EXT_DATE1 = #{extDate1}, EXT_DATE2 = #{extDate2}, EXT_NUM1 = #{extNum1}, EXT_NUM2 = #{extNum2}, EXT_NUM3 = #{extNum3}, MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDateNew} where ID = #{id}
